section.p: The smugglers are quite taken with your roguish ways. They share a glass of whisky with you. Swapping stories, you learn that they brought some warriors from Akatsurai to these shores. ‘I had to show them the way through the Magwort Fens,’ volunteers one man. ‘I reckon they had a treasure they wanted to leave there.’
Bidding the smugglers farewell, you set out again. .
